forest.description: A lush green forest with diverse Veramon life.

volcano.description: A dangerous volcanic area brimming with fire.

lake.description: A serene lake, home to water-type Veramons.

mountain.description: Rugged peaks where only the toughest Veramons survive.

city.description: Urban areas where tech-savvy Veramons have adapted to human civilization.

cave.description: Dark caverns hiding mysterious and sometimes dangerous Veramons.

cemetery.description: An eerie place where ghost and dark type Veramons lurk in the shadows.
